item.title: Having an acc hit somone while in non wildy
item.dc:creator: @iceman327 iceman327
item.description:
@iceman327 wrote:

[quote=“barkingdogc, post:1, topic:166329”]woudl this work?

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("player")){ inWild= true; } woudl that work so i can attk somone not in the wild?
ps: bak cleant out inbox[/quote]

Where would I add this: if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“player”)){
inWild= true;
}
